parameters.jsCode:
// Extract data from previous node (Aggregate Results) const date = $json.summaryDate || new Date().toLocaleDateString(); const validMembers = $json.validMembers || []; const expiredMembers = $json.expiredMembers || []; const totalStudents = $json.totalCount || (validMembers.length + expiredMembers.length); // Format current time for footer const now = new Date(); const timeString = now.toLocaleTimeString("en-US", { hour: "2-digit", minute: "2-digit", hour12: true, }); // Build HTML report const htmlBody = `
AH
${date}

ğŸ“… Daily Attendance Summary

Date: ${date}

ğŸ“Š Attendance Counts

  • Total Students: ${totalStudents}
  • âœ… Valid: ${$json.validCount}
  • âŒ Expired: ${$json.expiredCount}

âœ… Valid Members

    ${ validMembers.length > 0 ? validMembers.map(name => `
  • ${name}
    • `).join('') : '
  • No valid members today.
    • ' }

âŒ Expired Members

    ${ expiredMembers.length > 0 ? expiredMembers.map(name => `
  • ${name}
    • `).join('') : '
  • No expired members today.
    • ' }

This email was automatically generated on ${date}.

Generated by AH Attendance Automation â€“ MIT
Report generated at ${timeString}
`; return [{ json: { htmlBody } }];
